function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement pressurization, filtration, and purification technologies including nanotechnology","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure suitable ventilation rates, provide natural ventilation, use carbon dioxide tracer-gas techniques for analysis","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide open-ended corridors, avoid closed-end hallways, use ventilation louvers on doorstops","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase ventilation rate requirement achs-air changes per hour","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of normal ventilation, pressurization, filtration, dilution, nanotechnology, and purification technologies","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of open-ended corridors, installation of ventilation louvers, provision of upper ventilation windows, utilization of courtyard designs for integrated ventilation","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of approved mechanical ventilation and hybrid ventilation strategies","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of approved mechanical ventilation and monitoring of air distribution patterns","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of courtyard designs to create integrated ventilation channels and cohesive ventilation passages","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Meticulous calculations, simulations, and close monitoring of pressurization systems to ensure effectiveness","category":"Control of airflows (airtight / negative pressure)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further research to assess the health impacts of silver nanoparticle usage","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of safety measures to minimize health risks, and further scientific research on potential health impacts","category":"Maintanance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Designing buildings with ample windows to enable sunlight into various areas and maximize exposure to outdoor air","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of alternative germicidal technologies or strategic placement of uvgi systems","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Maximizing exposure to sunlight and daylight in building design, implementing germicidal measures","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection of steel and plastic surfaces","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Designing buildings with sufficient windows for natural light and air circulation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing designs that minimize the survival and transmission of infection sources","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of copper-infused materials for regularly touched surfaces, implementation of sensor-fitted entry doors, and reduction of horizontal surfaces","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of sensor-fitted entry doors and reduction of entry points to enable monitoring and compliance with guidelines","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Installation of advanced ventilation systems and air purifiers","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, surface disinfection, and use of protective equipment","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of modular building concepts, adaptive reuse strategies, and innovative design restrictions","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of mechanical ventilation systems to ensure efficient air circulation and filtration","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of antimicrobial materials, easy-to-clean surfaces, and regular disinfection protocols in designs","category":"Wall and floors treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of flexible and adaptable designs that can quickly react to new challenges, including the coronavirus epidemic","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive and ongoing research to understand the complex relationship between urban density and disease spread","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict public health measures, limit public gatherings, and promote remote work options","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct detailed epidemiological studies to identify key drivers of disease spread, implement targeted interventions based on findings","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement design strategies that prioritize infection control, ventilation, and sanitation measures.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive studies to understand the impact of urban design and transportation on pandemic dynamics, and develop adaptable strategies for different urban environments.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct detailed epidemiological studies to clarify the impact of population density on covid-19 spread, and develop adaptable public health strategies for diverse population densities.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing strict public health initiatives, promoting social distancing, and sharing resources between municipalities.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Providing legislative responsibilities and incentives to nudge the real estate industry towards investing in future-proofed buildings, promoting the economic benefits of such investments.","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing strategies for social distancing and reducing interactions in densely populated areas","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in sustainable construction and green building technologies","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving coordination and resource sharing between municipalities, and promoting consistent health guidelines","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement legislative responsibilities or incentives to encourage sustainable construction practices","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to control population mobility and improve public transportation safety","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposing travel restrictions and quarantines, promoting social distancing","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic support for affected businesses, promoting virtual alternatives for social interactions","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement travel restrictions and quarantine measures for highly connected regions.","category":"Quarantine
